summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1476, for the improvement of 31st Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from East Cherry Street to the north line of White's Addition to the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 15797 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
